How to get different kinds of monsters?

By Sturnum94 on Tuesday, July 18, 2006 - 02:28 pm:

On MRA2, how do get different monsters at the beginning of the game?

By Lisa Shock on Tuesday, July 18, 2006 - 06:24 pm:

Type passwords in at the shrine in town.

By Galgos77 on Wednesday, July 19, 2006 - 08:46 am:

But there's a limit to how many letters you can use. Also how do you unlock dooldles?

By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, July 19, 2006 - 07:11 pm:

Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): FAQ: How To Unlock All Breeds

Yes you start small and work your way up. There are 1-4 character passwords in our passwords list.
